EFI_HEALTH_FLAGS HealthFlags

EFI_SEC_PLATFORM_INFORMATION_RECORD

Field Documentation

EFI_HEALTH_FLAGS EFI_SEC_PLATFORM_INFORMATION_RECORD::HealthFlags

Contains information generated by microcode, hardware, and/or the Itanium processor PAL code about the state of the processor upon reset.
